title: Config Request
description: Asks the server for its configuration

title: Wireshark Visibility Test
description: A silly string designed to be easily filtered in Wireshark.

title: HHGTTG Test Signal (Mostly Harmless)
description: A reassuringly absurd packet for network monitoring. Don't Panic. Check your towel. Contains traces of bistromathics.
data: SIGNAL_TYPE:BISTROMATHIC_PING. CONTENTS:MOSTLY_HARMLESS. ORIGIN:LEIDEN_PLANETARY_SYSTEM(Sol-3). URGENCY:LOW. RESPONSE_EXPECTED:42. ADVICE:DONT_PANIC. DATECODE:Sol-3-Earth-Orbit-Cycle-Apr-19-2025-1143-CEST. TOWEL_STATUS:UNKNOWN. END_TRANSMISSION.

title: Vogon Network Inspection Form
description: Simulates a bureaucratic Vogon transmission regarding the Leiden sub-sector. Resistance is futile (and boring).

title: Paranoid Android Data Packet
description: Gloomily delivers test data from Leiden, as only Marvin could. Life? Don't talk to me about life.
data: PACKET_DESIGNATION:GPP_UNIT_734(Sub-Ether). STATUS:UTTERLY_DEPRESSED. PAYLOAD:POINTLESS_TEST_BITS_FROM_LEIDEN_SECTOR. TASK_ANALYSIS:INFINITELY_TEDIOUS. PROBABILITY_OF_MEANINGFUL_EXISTENCE:ZERO. BRAIN_THE_SIZE_OF_A_PLANET... sigh. TIME:19-APR-2025_11:43:42_CEST. END_OF_MISERABLE_TRANSMISSION.
